org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.config
Class AeFileBasedEngineConfig

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.config.AeConfiguration
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.config.AeDefaultEngineConfiguration
          org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.config.AeFileBasedEngineConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, IAeEngineConfiguration, IAeUpdatableEngineConfig
public class AeFileBasedEngineConfig
extends AeDefaultEngineConfiguration

Extension of AeDefaultEngineConfiguratio that is capable of receiving change notification from a AeDirectoryScanner. Allow for config file changes made externally (not throug console) to be detected.
